name: Flow Projection (Mesh)
description: Construct flow paths over a mesh

inputs.name: Mesh
inputs.description: Base landscape form (as a mesh) for the flow calculation

inputs.name: Points
inputs.description: Start points for the flow paths. These should be above the mesh (they will be projected on to it)

inputs.name: Fidelity
inputs.description: Amount to move for each flow iteration. Small numbers may take a long time to compute. If not specified or set to 0 a (hopefully) sensible step size will be calculated.

inputs.name: Steps
inputs.description: A limit to the number of flow iterations. Leave unset or to 0 for an unlimited set of iterations

inputs.name: Thread
inputs.description: Whether to multithread the solution (this can speed up long calculations)

outputs.name: Flow Points
outputs.description: The points of each simulated flow path 'jump'

outputs.name: Flow Paths
outputs.description: A polyline linking each of the flow points into a path
